This is a test document for upload testing.

It contains some sample text that can be used to test the document upload functionality.

The chatbot should be able to process this document and index its contents in Pinecone.

Some facts that could be retrieved:
- Paris is the capital of France
- The Great Wall of China is more than 13,000 miles long
- The first computer programmer was Ada Lovelace
- Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level
